## FirebaseAppInternals.removeAuthTokenListener() method

Removes a token listener.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeAuthTokenListener(listener: (token: string) => void): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listener | (token: string) =&gt; void | The listener to remove. |
